body.description: Want all the moisture without the heaviness of a rich face cream? e.l.f. SKIN Holy Hydration! Gel-Yeah Moisturizer is a thirst-quenching, hydrating gel moisturizer with a lightweight, bouncy texture and allantoin plus squalane sinks into the skin, leaving you with a complexion that looks and feels smoother, softer, and plumped the e.l.f. up. Why you'll love it: Gel moisturizer leaves skin soft, plumped-up and hydrated Unique gel texture is lightweight, non-greasy and fast-absorbing Infused with allantoin plus squalane Key Ingredient: Allantoin - helps to hydrate and plump the look of skin Ingredients may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the packaging of the product received for the list of ingredients in your particular product. All e.l.f. products are proud to be 100% vegan, cruelty-free, and Leaping Bunny Certified. Because kindness is chic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Great Product For Older Skin
reviews.reviewText: From the first use on my face, I have completely loves this product. It started right away to heal dry skin patches. It is cooling and calming to my skin. I have never before found a product this nice for my face. It feels like it was made for my skin. My facial skin has not felt this nice for years. I have now bought more of the product line to try out. So far no irritated or broken out skin. I absolutely love this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect gel moisturizer for summer!
reviews.reviewText: I love Elf products, so this one was no shocker with how good of a moisturizer this is. I have dry/combo skin, so the gel moisturizers are my go-to. First off, this smells amazing! It’s a slightly transparent gel that scoops out easily, but I would recommend using a spoon for this. This doesn’t spread super easily over my skin even for it being a gel, so I found that I have to apply a fairly hefty amount to completely cover my face. This also slightly dried me out, so I wouldn’t recommend this as a winter moisturizer. I left this on for a few hours, and I didn’t have any severe oily skin, so this is perfect for the summer when I’m sweaty!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great moisturizer for sensitive & combo skin
reviews.reviewText: I have used many e.l.f. products over the years, including another moisturizer similar to this one. My experience with this brand has been that they generally make good quality products that are also affordable, and I would say that this moisturizer is on par with what I would expect from this brand in terms of quality and affordability. The texture of this moisturizer feels similar to a gel or a silicone based moisturizer, not sticky, but very smooth. It seems to absorb into the skin quickly and doesn't feel oily or leave a shine. I have extremely sensitive skin, and this didn't cause me any issues. It does have a very light fragrance, nothing too perfume-y. It's just a very light, fresh, and clean fragrance. Very mild. I love this moisturizer. It's great for my combination skin because it's very hydrating but also doesn't leave my skin feeling oily. It's wonderful. I will definitely be buying more when this one runs out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice gel moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: This is a good dupe for the laneige moisturizer that is in similar packaging. They both are gel moisturizers. This one has a light scent, absorbs well and is not heavy or greasy. But it does moisturize nicely. I have combo skin and it helps the dry areas feel better. You can mix it with your regular moisturizer for a little extra, or use it at night since it doesn't have sunblock.The moisturizer did not irritate my skin at all and you get a ton of it in the jar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight affordable moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: I love this new lightly scented moisturizer from elf. It is lightweight, so personally it is not ideal for me for winter nights as it does not provide as much hydration as I need, as it is too lightweight and not thick enough for my combo dry skin (right now). It is perfect as a lightweight moisturizer in the morning. Just make sure you always put sunscreen on right after (which I always do with my spf anyways). Overall, a decent lightweight gel moisturizer from elf.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't absorb well
reviews.reviewText: This is a heavy moisturizer, it does seem to work well but it's a lot more than I'd use for my face regularly. This seems better as a body lotion for my skin type.That being said it's good for that, it keeps my skin hydrated and doesn't cause any irritation. Additionally the fragrance is not overly distracting and dissipates quickly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far I like it
reviews.reviewText: The texture of this feels a little bit sticky at first but it dries well. It doesn’t feel super moisturizing but it does leave my skin looking healthier, if that makes sense. I like it so far for putting on before some other skin care products at night. The price point is great for the size of tub you get.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars e.l.f. Gel Moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: This gel moisturizer is pretty cool. It goes on smoothly and absorbs quickly without leaving any residue, and it doesn't feel like you just put gel on your face. I have weird combo skin where it oily in spots but also dry and flaky at the same time, and this gel seems to be working well for me so far with keeping my skin hydrated but not adding to the oil slick!
